ESE4033C - Critical Issues and Trends in.name: ESE4033C - Critical Issues and Trends in Secondary Education

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Examination of critical and contemporary issues and trends in secondary education classrooms. Laboratory experiences will connect to the issues and trends specific to particular content areas.

Course Description.text: Culminating seminar emphasizing current classroom management and assessment issues, as they relate to teaching in the secondary grades.
